reviews.text: The major upside is that the cinema in this mall screens most (if not all) its shows in original language with subtitles. So if you are tired from visiting tourist places all day and crave for some mindless entertainment, this is not a bad choice. But it was also not more than that. The mall is generally clean, but feels dying.

This is a small local shopping facility near the Olympic Village apartments. We purchased a few items in the supermarket to snack on. Good range and prices were ok. I didn't pay much attention to the other facilities but it does have a cinema.

the mall is very good located just in front the beach of vila olímpica
,cinema in english!!!,good food ,very very very recomanded

This place doesnt get great reviews but it certainly served us well during our visit. I stopped by the supermarket every day to pick up the essentials all at reasonable prices. There are a number of restaurants and small shops here but no major brands so to speak. Its a local centre and ideal for essentials if staying nearby.
This is the only decent place in Barcelona that house a movie theater (cinema) where you can watch movies in English or any other original language version. All other theaters dub movies in Spanish.
